channel.title: RuneScape Map
channel.description:
I was going to re-build RuneScape in MineCraft but didn't have the drive to do it, so if anyone wants it here you go.
Download: http://uppit.com/w2a1yri1kgck/RuneScape_Map.zip
I do recommend getting MCEDIT to help build. I made it out of wool, so you will need to replace a lot of blocks. This Map is freaking huge, I was just doing like 100x100 at a time, and just replacing those area's in MCEDIT with the proper blocks. I did Wool because it offered more colors and id looked a little better.
Here are a few pictures: [img]http://flarepix.com/images/2013-08-01_165IpVe.png[/img] [img]http://flarepix.com/images/2013-08-10_006OqEf.png[/img] [img]http://flarepix.com/images/2013-08-11_20BkbKa.png[/img] [img]http://flarepix.com/images/2013-10-13_18lSF91.png[/img]

item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I was going to re-build RuneScape in MineCraft but didn’t have the drive to do it, so if anyone wants it here you go.

Download: http://uppit.com/w2a1yri1kgck/RuneScape_Map.zip

I do recommend getting MCEDIT to help build. I made it out of wool, so you will need to replace a lot of blocks. This Map is freaking huge, I was just doing like 100x100 at a time, and just replacing those area’s in MCEDIT with the proper blocks. I did Wool because it offered more colors and id looked a little better.
